en.name: Counselling
en.coverDescription: Almost all managers will face the issue of dealing with staff whose personal problems are affecting their work and they need the know-how and sensitivity to address such situations. This course introduces counselling techniques and active listening for managers.

fr.name: Être un manager à l’écoute
fr.coverDescription: Presque tous les managers seront un jour confrontés à des collaborateurs dont les problèmes personnels affectent leur travail. Ils auront alors besoin de leur savoir-faire et de la sensibilité nécessaires pour faire face à de telles situations. Ce cours vous présente des techniques de conseil et d’écoute active destinées aux managers.

de.name: Ein Manager zu sein, der zuhört
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
Almost all managers will face the issue of dealing with staff whose personal problems are affecting their work and they need the know-how and sensitivity to address such situations. This course introduces counselling techniques and active listening for managers.

th.name: Counselling
th.coverDescription: Almost all managers will face the issue of dealing with staff whose personal problems are affecting their work and they need the know-how and sensitivity to address such situations. This course introduces counselling techniques and active listening for managers.
